haberman.rhizomatics.fsm

Class Application

  • java.lang.Object
    • haberman.rhizomatics.fsm.Application

  • public class Application
extends java.lang.Object
    The Application state machine.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Application.AppState
      States enum.
      (package private) static class  Application.AppTrigger
      Triggers enum.
      (package private) class  Application.GrantEntry
      Action taken before the state machine enters Application.AppState.GRANTING -> grant().
      (package private) class  Application.RunEntry
      Action taken before the state machine enters Application.AppState.RUNNING -> schedule_fullscreen_().
      (package private) class  Application.StartEntry
      Action taken before the state machine enters Application.AppState.STARTED -> grant_check() and run().
      (package private) class  Application.StopEntry
      Action taken before the state machine enters Application.AppState.STOPPED -> nothing yet.

      Fullscreen thread Handler.

      Fullscreen thread Runnable.
      private boolean location_
      Indicates that the application is granted with ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION permission.
      private boolean record_
      Indicates that the application is granted with RECORD_AUDIO permission.
      private android.view.View view_
      MainActivity's content view.

        Grants the application with required permissions.

      • granted

        public boolean granted()
        grant_check() with boolean response clone.
        Returns:
        true is both location_ and record_ are true, false otherwise.

      • grant_check

        Sets location_ and record_ values by checking that the application is granted with required permissions.
